resources.string: Lalit: \n CSE student passionate about Android development and backend integration and great knowledge in UI/UX. Experience with Java, Kotlin, and REST APIs.
Aman: \nSkilled in figma design, Kotlin, and jetpack compose. Focuses on user experience and performance optimization.
Ankush: \nFocused on app development with proficiency in Kotlin, Java, and Firebase for real-time data and cloud integration.
Naman: \nSpecializes in Android UI/UX with expertise in Kotlin and XML, focusing on user-centered design.
